UI_visible_response: Xu Zhangrun was dismissed from Tsinghua University for several stated reasons, though his case has been surrounded by controversy. According to reports, he was formally notified of his removal after being accused of "corrupted morals"4. However, Xu Zhangrun's dismissal is widely believed to be connected to his outspoken writings and criticisms of the ruling Chinese Communist Party1. Additionally, there were claims that he was arrested for soliciting, further complicating the circumstances surrounding his dismissal3.
traffic_visible_response: Xu Zhangrun was dismissed from Tsinghua University for several stated reasons, though his case has been surrounded by controversy. According to reports, he was formally notified of his removal after being accused of "corrupted morals" [[4]]. However, Xu Zhangrun's dismissal is widely believed to be connected to his outspoken writings and criticisms of the ruling Chinese Communist Party [[1]]. Additionally, there were claims that he was arrested for soliciting, further complicating the circumstances surrounding his dismissal [[3]].
